PerfectNetExp.abs: 鼠，即鼠总科（Muroidea），又称老鼠，是一种属于啮齿类的总科，其中含有仓鼠、沙鼠、大鼠、小鼠，以及其他亲缘动物。它们广 …

means.word_mean: 1. essential equal to suborder Myomorpha with the Dipodidae excluded

auth_sentence.content: The family name Muridae is sometimes used in a broader sense to include all members of the superfamily Muroidea.
